00176 template <class T>

00179 template <class T>
00180 inline
00181 sc_global<T>::sc_global()
00182   : m_map()
00183   // use &m_instance as unique "non-process" key (NULL denotes 'sc_main' context)
00184   , m_proc( &m_instance )
00185   , m_value_ptr( 0 )
00186 {}

00188 
00189 template <class T>
00190 inline
00191 void
00192 sc_global<T>::update()
00193 {
00194     void* p = sc_core::sc_get_current_process_b();
00195     if( p != m_proc )
00196     {
00197         const T* vp = m_map[p];
00198         if( vp == 0 )
00199         {
00200             vp = new T( sc_without_context() );
00201             m_map.insert( p, vp );
00202         }
00203         m_proc = p;
00204         m_value_ptr = vp;
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 template <class T>
00210 inline
00211 sc_global<T>*
00212 sc_global<T>::instance()
00213 {
00214     if( m_instance == 0 )
00215     {
00216         m_instance = new sc_global<T>;
00217     }
00218     return m_instance;
00219 }

00239 inline
00240 sc_context<T>::sc_context( const T& value_, sc_context_begin begin_ )
00241 : m_value( value_ ),
00242   m_def_value_ptr( sc_global<T>::instance()->value_ptr() ),
00243   m_old_value_ptr( 0 )

00251 
00252 template <class T>
00253 inline
00254 sc_context<T>::~sc_context()
00255 {
00256     if( m_old_value_ptr != 0 )
00257     {
00258         m_def_value_ptr = m_old_value_ptr;
00259         m_old_value_ptr = 0;
00260     }
00261 }

00263 
00264 template <class T>
00265 inline
00266 void
00267 sc_context<T>::begin()
00268 {
00269     if( m_old_value_ptr == 0 )
00270     {
00271         m_old_value_ptr = m_def_value_ptr;
00272         m_def_value_ptr = &m_value;
00273     }
00274     else
00275     {
00276         SC_REPORT_ERROR( sc_core::SC_ID_CONTEXT_BEGIN_FAILED_, 0 );
00277     }
00278 }

00288         m_old_value_ptr = 0;
00289     }
00290     else

00292         SC_REPORT_ERROR( sc_core::SC_ID_CONTEXT_END_FAILED_, 0 );
